body_html: We should be careful with AVX-512 because PyTorch takes a huge performance hit when the clock speed isn't at max (e.g. I've seen many cases where the powersave governor reduces perf by 2x even when running on the GPU). So if e.g. someone does a single sum() on the CPU and then only GPU ops, AVX-512 will cause heavy downclocking and we might feel this. A careful benchmark suite will be needed.

body: We should be careful with AVX-512 because PyTorch takes a huge performance hit when the clock speed isn't at max (e.g. I've seen many cases where the `powersave` governor reduces perf by 2x even when running on the GPU). So if e.g. someone does a single `sum()` on the CPU and then only GPU ops, AVX-512 will cause heavy downclocking and we might feel this. A careful benchmark suite will be needed.
